name: Docker
title: docker.com
shortDescription: Docker simplifies the process of building, sharing, and running containerized applications. It is designed for developers and organizations to create multiple containers efficiently, whether locally or in the cloud. An example use case is a software development team using Docker to manage and distribute container applications seamlessly across different environments, ensuring consistent performance and security.
pros: Integrates with major development tools and platforms
Large, secure registry for sharing container images
